newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: GIST-BROCADES IN PERUVIAN JOINT VENTURE.
newsitem.headline: GIST-BROCADES IN PERUVIAN JOINT VENTURE.

text.p: Dutch biochemicals and food group Gist-Brocades NV said on Wednesday it had set up a joint venture in Peru with Sintesis Quimica SA to produce bulk semi-synthetic penicillins (SSPs).
Sintesis Quimica has a production facility in the Puente Piedra district, north west of Lima, which employs 150 people.
Gist-Brocades said it would provide technology and marketing activities to the joint venture, which is expected to have annual turnover of more than $15 million.

"By establishing this joint venture, Gist-Brocades further strengthens its position in the South American market," the Dutch group said. It said Sintesis Quimica has a strong position in semi-synthetic penicillins in South America and had expanded considerably in recent years.
